txt.en:
'Ah, I thank you for your recent help in dealing with our difficulties here in the Lone-lands, but I fear that I have received an urgent missive from my old companion, Captain Trotter of Trestlebridge.

'It seems that he fears an imminent attack upon the town by Orcs out of the North Downs, and is asking for any able-bodied warriors to aid them as soon as possible.

'While we have no men to spare ourselves, I could arrange for a fast horse to bring you to Trestlebridge if you feel you might be able to aid Captain Trotter.'

'So you're off to aid Captain Trotter in Trestlebridge are you? We'll be sorry to see you go, but hopefully you can do as much good there as you have for us here.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>WARNING: Completing this quest will immediately send you to Trestlebridge in the North Downs.</rgb>

Frideric the Elder has received an urgent request from an old companion of his -- Captain Trotter of Trestlebridge -- requesting any aid that he might muster from Ost Guruth in staving off a threatened Orkish incursion upon the town.\n\nSpeak with Captain Trotter and see what aid you can offer him!
Speak with Frideric in Ost Guruth to arrange a fast mount to Trestlebridge.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>WARNING: Completing this quest will immediately send you to Trestlebridge in the North Downs.</rgb>
